newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Pribadi says Amcol stake not for sale.
newsitem.headline: Pribadi says Amcol stake not for sale.

text.p: Amcol Holdings' single largest shareholder, Indonesian businessman Henry Pribadi, has denied he is putting his 17.92 percent stake in the company up for sale, the Business Times said on Tuesday.
"Contrary to yesterday's Business Times report, I have not put my 17.92 percent stake in Amcol Holdings on the market," the paper quoted Pribadi as saying in a statement.
The newspaper on Monday had said Pribadi, managing director of Amcol until the company went under judicial management, had put the stake up for sale.
